name: Captain and Pilot's Space Adventure
description:
Survive as long as you can and score the highest score by shooting asteroids and UFO's!

Theme: Unlikely Combination of 2 Characters personalities (Pilot & Captain) on a space adventure, sadly I didn't have time to really implement it, so the theme is "Unlikely Combination of 2d and 3d assets"

Assets:

Lean Pool (Pooling Solution)

Kenney Assets:

Space Shooter

Nature Pack

Space Kit

Sci-Fi UI

Platformer Characters

Particle Pack

Font

Credits:

Design & Code: Sebastian Corfitzen (SwebDK)
Music: Harry Damm
